cyclone.name: MATTHEW
cyclone.current_location: about 100 miles south of Tiburon, Haiti
cyclone.trajectory: continuing north, then turning north-northwest toward eastern Cuba and through the Bahamas toward the Florida/SE U.S. coastline

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch for Dominican Republic from Puerto Plata westward to the Haiti border
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning for Haiti, eastern Cuba, and portions of the southeastern and central Bahamas; Tropical Storm Warning for Dominican Republic (Barahona westward) and Jamaica
weather_observation.impacted_coast: South-western Haiti, eastern Cuba, Jamaica, Dominican Republic, southeastern to central Bahamas
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: None listed near Puerto Rico in wind-probability table
weather_observation.wind: Only occasional breezy conditions from outer gradients; no tropical-storm-force winds expected.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected for Puerto Rico as core remains well west.
weather_observation.rainfall: Isolated light showers possible from distant outer bands; heavy rainfall focus remains over Hispaniola and Cuba.
weather_observation.other_hazards: None anticipated that would disrupt port operations in San Juan, PR.
